metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000051 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Artifex Mupdf version 1.12.0 contains a Use After Free vulnerability infz_keep_key_storable that can result in DOS / Possible code execution. Thisattack appear to be exploitable via Victim opens a specially crafted PDF.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1000051` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mupdf - 1.14.0+ds1-4
mupdf-tools - 1.14.0+ds1-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mupdf package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.14.0+ds1-4').
